title: All my highlights get these weird, loud, static noises
body:
Im trying to use the official replays to get a highlight. They work fine, except for the sound. 

Has this happened to other? Is it a known issue? I don't get how to fix it.. All other sounds work fine. I have a video if needed. 

EDIT: Video. 
https://youtu.be/2uWu_CgsWDI

replies.body: I have the same problem with you.
i get it on all my replays even if I try downloading it 4 times its always the same

There could be an issue with how the highlight rendered and might have messed up.  I recommend posting this over at the[ client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards to be reviewed.  Replays are still in testing, so you might run into issues like that.  Thanks for the report!
